CustomField.description: This is the amount value that pulls from when an opportunity is created from a lead and the SDR estimated amount they think the opportunity is worth. Is used in a workflow rule to push into the Opportunity Amount field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the amount value that pulls from when an opportunity is created from a lead and the SDR estimated amount they think the opportunity is worth. Is used in a workflow rule to push into the Opportunity Amount field.
CustomField.label: Lead Amount
